name: ion/php-trans-porter
description: A PHP command-line utility and class library to convert source code between PHP 5.6 / 7.0 / 7.1 / 7.2.

suggest.nikic/php-parser: Nikita Popov's PHP Parser is a fantastic tool for any project that needs to parse or generate PHP code - PHP Transporter is possible thanks to this project (thanks Nikita!)
suggest.phing/phing: Phing helps you to automate your build system (i.e. trans-porting to multiple versions of PHP)
suggest.ion/auto-loader: A small auto-loading library, compatible with Composer, that allows you to customise your auto-loading functionality.
